blog.name: ao3feed-tonystark
blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

summary: Lord, What Fools These Mortals Be
title: Lord, What Fools These Mortals Be
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2S51c5q

by iam93percentstardust

Famed director Phil Coulson brings Shakespeare’s beloved play, A Midsummer Night’s Dream, to Broadway. This production though comes with a twist: a brief but passionate love affair between the faerie king, Oberon, and his attendant, Puck. In the roles of the two star-crossed lovers, Coulson casts America’s darling Steve Rogers, fresh off his third Academy Award, and Broadway royalty, Tony Stark. Steve quickly finds himself falling for the quick-witted and sarcastic actor but Tony is dating the stage manager. Unwilling to come between the seemingly happy couple, Steve steps back but all isn’t right behind the scenes and Tony may need him when everything falls apart.

Words: 174, Chapters: 1/56, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe, The Avengers (Marvel) - All Media Types
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Steve Rogers, Tony Stark, T'Challa, Brunnhilde | Valkyrie (Marvel), Clint Barton, Loki (Marvel), Natasha Romanov (Marvel), James “Bucky” Barnes, James “Rhodey” Rhodes, Pepper Potts, Justin Hammer, Thor (Marvel), Sam Wilson (Marvel), Darcy Lewis, Bruce Banner, Sunset Bain, Peggy Carter, Betty Ross, Sharon Carter (Marvel), Wanda Maximoff, Jane Foster (Marvel), Peter Parker, Phil Coulson, Nick Fury, Maria Hill, Tiberius Stone, Hope Van Dyne, Janet Van Dyne, Pietro Maximoff, Stephen Strange, Scott Lang, Rumiko Fujikawa, Shuri (Marvel), Carol Danvers, Nakia (Black Panther)
  • Relationships: Steve Rogers/Tony Stark, Tony Stark/Tiberius Stone, background Natasha Romanov/James “Bucky” Barnes
  • Additional Tags: so many characters - Freeform, seriously this is an ensemble fic, Abusive Relationships, Hurt/Comfort, Angst with a Happy Ending, Alternate Universe - Theatre, yeah this is that theater au that nobody asked for, but guess what, you’re gonna get it anyway, very minor Steve/Peggy, so minor, blink and you’ll miss it minor, Pining, so much pining, Pining Steve, Not so much oblivious Tony as it is already taken Tony

read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2S51c5q

URL must include “Definitely” at the beginning.

These are just suggestions and you are not limited to these characters. (Comic characters are welcome). We just ask you refrain from creating your own original character.

summary: Looking for more blogs to follow!
body:
Looking for more blogs to follow!

- post, the 100, supernatural,marvel, the walking dead.

-multifandom is ok

- must be hate free

-bellarke, stucky or destiel is a bonus but not necessary I’m also ok with most other ships.

Like or reblog and I’ll check out your blog :)

blog.name: sitruksista
blog.title: Just colds and stuff
blog.description:
I'm on my 20s, keep that in mind. This is a kink blog, feel free to assume that anything that isn't tagged "unrelated" is at least vaguely sexual. There might be exeptions and if you see something distubing here, that considered, please send me an ask or a DM (chances are I either posted it on the wrong blog or forgot to tag it but in general nothing of that sort should find its way here). Currently focused on other stuff. I'm not into AUs and while this was originally a part of something longer and I have since removed the rest of it, I felt like leaving this here because it's such a Big Thing lol.
If you like Dragon Age, Harry Potter or House (or Voltron, Shiro more specifically) and would be interested in chatting about them, please hit me with a message. Same if you like scat in the context of illness (with or without emeto).
mainblog: neonkarkki.tumblr.com
fandom blog or what ever: eijaksa.tumblr.com

summary: I just want people around me to understand that when I sassily say “is he though??” (or some variation of that) that I’m quoting...
body: I just want people around me to understand that when I sassily say “is he though??” (or some variation of that) that I’m quoting Thor and not trying to be rude

blog.name: brickgirl1993
blog.title: Brickgirl
blog.description:
Jess ~ 26 ~ She/Her ~ Pansexual ~ Democrat ~ Frustrated American (Trump is not my President) ~ Writer ~ Gamer ~

My Blog is as messy as my brain! My Fandoms include: Marvel (I ship anyone that makes Tony happy and Ironstrange) (Extreme Team Iron Man), Miraculous Ladybug (Ship: Love Square), How to Train Your Dragon (Ship: Hicstrid; Hijack/Frostcup if there’s a Crossover fic) Harry Potter (Ship: Hinny), Sailor Moon (Ships: Obviously Usagi and Mamoru, Sailor Senshi/Shitennou), Legend of Zelda (Ships: Zelink)... and other random stuff!

body:
DAREDEVIL SEASON 3

So I legit just binged watched the whole season and didn’t even sleep last night!

I love my baby so much!

Though I’m not entirely sure how much of this I will be putting into my fanfic. (There was so much!)

Regardless 2 things I need to point out:

Matt at the end was perched on the corner of the building like Spider-Man! I freaking lost it!

Oh and then him calling Jessica Jones out!

This made me so happy!

Can’t wait for the next Marvel Netflix show (Though Honestly I only care about Jessica Jones and Daredevil)

tags: I always feel like I miss all the important regional and era related quirks that I should include for accuracy's sake : |
summary: Maybe the bigger issue with I trying to write anything Venom related actually is that I don’t even remember what kind of an...
body: Maybe the bigger issue with I trying to write anything Venom related actually is that I don’t even remember what kind of an accent movie Eddie has. Like… I remember I noticed it while watching the movie and I’ve always been bothered by the fact that I know I don’t write characters speaking like they actually do simply because I don’t know what sort of regional things I should pay attention to.

reblog.comment: Maybe the bigger issue with I trying to write anything Venom related actually is that I don’t even remember what kind of an accent movie Eddie has. Like… I remember I noticed it while watching the movie and I’ve always been bothered by the fact that I know I don’t write characters speaking like they actually do simply because I don’t know what sort of regional things I should pay attention to.

trail.content_raw: Maybe the bigger issue with I trying to write anything Venom related actually is that I don’t even remember what kind of an accent movie Eddie has. Like… I remember I noticed it while watching the movie and I’ve always been bothered by the fact that I know I don’t write characters speaking like they actually do simply because I don’t know what sort of regional things I should pay attention to.
trail.content: Maybe the bigger issue with I trying to write anything Venom related actually is that I don’t even remember what kind of an accent movie Eddie has. Like… I remember I noticed it while watching the movie and I’ve always been bothered by the fact that I know I don’t write characters speaking like they actually do simply because I don’t know what sort of regional things I should pay attention to.

summary: listen here you motherfuckers..... i may not have my shit together, my life may be heading down shit creek, my grades may be...

title: CLASSIFIED
body:

by BearCub

Special Agent Sigrid Griefhardt. Captain in the British Army, Sniper, Engineer, Weapons Technician, Mercenary.

Her past is one of trauma and loss, her future is one for her to decide.

[Punisher/MCU verse crossover featuring Original Character]

Feedback appreciated

blog.description: Tag list | Header by my amazing bf @mutantbanner!! Cosmo, 21, he/him, autistic. Wannabe astronaut. Neurotic fucking disaster. Art blog is @astrobruce, AO3 is Ancalime1.

question: Top Ten underrated MCU characters!
answer:
OOOHHH yeah this is gonna be an unpopular list. Get ready!!

My Top Ten Underrated MCU Characters (in no particular order):

  1. Bruce Banner. For obvious reasons (though he seems to be gaining popularity on tumblr somewhat…?)
  2. Heimdall. Dude barely gets attention despite being an ultra badass… I mean he really didn’t get a chance to shine until Ragnarok, and that just ain’t fair. Plus he’s played by Idris Fucking Elba, and that ain’t someone to be slept on.
  3. Sam Wilson. Sam has been at Steve’s side from the get-go, going along with whatever dangerously bad ideas Steve’s cooked up because SOMEBODY’S gotta keep this idiot safe. My favorite line? “I do what he does, just slower.” Fuckin’ iconic.
  4. Peggy Carter. IF YOU HAVEN’T SEEN HER SHOW. GO SEE HER SHOW. She don’t need no fancy powers to kick ass and take names; all she needs is some upbeat jazz playing in the background and she’s good to go.
  5. Maria Hill. She’s like the Sam to Nick Fury’s Steve. Just going along with whatever ludicrously dangerous scheme he’s planned. Like she believes in him of course, but she still maintains a role as the voice of reason. Like the MCU’s version of Dana Scully. Also, she’s a badass. Like a really big badass. She’s just… *clenches fist* awesome.
  6. James “Rhodey” Rhodes. Another voice of reason, and an EXCELLENT foil to Tony’s character. He’s by Tony’s side no matter what. SHIT. Dude wouldn’t even let paralysis stop him. Talk about having an iron will (pun at least semi-intended).
  7. Sif. Ah… my darling Sif. Hey, where was she in Ragnarok? Kind of crappy how she can essentially be boiled down to an unrequited love interest, only to Never Be Spoken Of Again. It’s even crappier when you think of how she had to fight so hard just to prove herself as a warrior (“and who proved wrong that a mere maiden could be a warrior?” “I did”). Hopefully we’ll see more of her in the future.
  8. Jane Foster. Speaking of Characters Missing From Ragnarok, Jane’s treatment wasn’t much better in that the most she got was a casual mention (but for now I’ll satisfy myself with the theory that she got together with Sif, who is much better looking than Thor anyways). Seriously though. Jane is the world’s foremost expert on Astronomy and Astrophysics. And to top it all off, she withstood the power of the Reality Stone like a fuckin’ champ (kind of like how Pete did in GOTG — hey, maybe she’s part Celestial?). But yeah. Jane’s a badass in her own right, and doesn’t get NEARLY enough attention.
  9. Pretty Much Everyone From Ant-Man and the Wasp. I feel bad for cramming them all in this one section, but here goes: Scott is a Mega-Dork but also a Great (and probably the most functional) Dad in the MCU. Hope is a Sciencey Badass with a great character arc involving her family. Janet is also a Sciencey Badass and is SO CARING AND EMPATHETIC AND SELFLESS AND GOD OKAY I’M GUSHING. Ghost is a complex, interesting character with a poignant story about being exploited and weaponized by SHIELD. Also she’s a badass. OH AND LUIS. Luis is so damn funny and charming and relatable and incredibly skilled. Also, no one tells a story like him (“you put a dime in him, you gotta let the whole song play out”).
  10. Wanda Maximoff. Okay. In fairness, Wanda hasn’t really gotten a chance to spread her wings in MCU, but she has SO much potential (which is why I’m glad she’s getting a tv show). Wanda is simultaneously incredibly powerful, but also incredibly flawed. She tries to make things right, first in Age of Ultron, then in Civil War — but they seldom turn out that way. She’s got blood on her hands and regret in her bones. She feels like a monster because of everything she’s done, which is why she goes into hiding, only to be flung into the fray again in Infinity War. I don’t know about you guys, but I’m feeling an intense Bruce Banner parallel here. I’d love for those two to have a one-on-one, perhaps with Bruce forgiving and consoling her and ultimately being a mentor to her.

Okay, that’s that! My top ten underrated MCU characters. Thanks for reading!
